entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
